Title: From Prompts to Protection: How Security Copilot Reinvents Cyber Defense
Abstract: Cyber defense is no longer just written in code or policy, it’s spoken in prompts. I’ll explore how Security Copilot turns those prompts into protection by optimizing Conditional Access, enforcing Zero Trust, and transforming AI insights. Join me to see how words become your line of defense.

Title: Driving Enterprise Migrations with Process Automation and AI Innovation
Abstract: Discover how automation and AI are redefining enterprise migrations. Learn proven frameworks that cut timelines, reduce risk, and boost agility plus emerging trends like AI-driven planning and zero-downtime cutovers that transform migrations into a strategic advantage.

Title: I talk to ChatGPT about things
Abstract: The word ChatGPT has captured the imagination and the internet, but does ChatGPT truly know everything, is it truly AGI?

Title: AI as Your Agile Copilot: Predictable, Risk-Aware, and Human-Centric Delivery in the Age of Prompt Engineering
Abstract: Learn how AI and prompt engineering can cut Agile delivery overruns, improve estimation accuracy, and detect risks before they derail projects while keeping your teams human-centric, ethical, and high-performing.

Company1: Senior Technical Program Manager at Ford Motor Company
Title: Cloud Telematics for Fleet Management: Efficiency, Sustainability, and Insights
Abstract: Discover how cloud-based telematics is revolutionizing fleet management. Learn how IoT, AI, and predictive analytics boost efficiency, cut costs, and drive sustainability while keeping fleets connected anywhere. Real-world results and future trends included.

Company1: Delivery Manager At Zensar Technologies Inc
Title: Supply Chain Resilience with Partner & Field Automation: Post-COVID Lessons
Abstract: Discover how Partner & Field Automation turned pandemic disruptions into resilience. Learn practical frameworks to streamline supply chains, boost agility, and future-proof operations with digital maturity in an era of global uncertainty.

JobTitle1: Engineering Lead - eBay Listing Platform and APIs
Title: Prompt Engineering for E-commerce AI: Transforming Seller Tools by 2030
Abstract: Learn proven prompt engineering strategies that transform e-commerce AI tools. Discover frameworks for personalization, inventory, content, and conversational commerce that deliver measurable ROI and competitive advantage.

Title: AI-Powered Code Transformations at Scale: Empowering Developers
Abstract: Buckle up: imagine AI automatically transforming your codebase overnight! In this talk, explore cutting-edge LLM tools - empowering developers to automate migrations, fix code issues, and squash compile errors at scale. Say goodbye to tedious edits!

Title: Prompt Engineering for Data Engineering Unlocking Natural Language Access to Cloud Data
Abstract: Discover how prompt engineering and LLMs are reshaping data engineering. I’ll show how natural language interfaces let anyone build queries, trigger pipelines, and unlock real time insights without deep technical skills. Smarter data, simpler access, faster decisions.

Title: Orchestrating Enterprise Intelligence: Designing Multi-Agent AI for ERP and Hybrid IT Systems
Abstract: Discover how multi-agent AI is transforming enterprise ERP and hybrid IT systems. Learn a proven framework, see case studies with measurable ROI, and leave with a playbook to design and scale intelligent, resilient enterprise ecosystems.

Title: Designing Data Science Careers Through A/B Testing and Experimentation Mastery
Abstract: Master the art of A/B testing to supercharge your data science career! Learn how top-tier experimentation, statistical precision, and real-world impact can set you apart in AI-driven roles—from optimizing products to fine-tuning LLMs. Don’t just analyze—experiment!
Slides: Bhavana Reddy Chadagonda - Conf42 Prompt Engineering 2025.pdf

Company1: Manager Data Management At Ally Bank
Title: Transforming Enterprise Data with Lakehouse Architecture at Scale
Abstract: Discover how Data Lakehouse Architecture unifies the power of data lakes and warehouses to deliver real-time, AI-ready insights at scale. Learn best practices to cut costs, streamline workflows, and fuel next-gen prompt engineering innovation.

Title: Prompt-Driven Self-Healing Data Pipelines with Reinforcement Learning for Resilient Systems
Abstract: Data pipelines keep breaking under schema drift, anomalies, and scaling stress. What if they could heal themselves? Discover how prompt-engineered RL agents build self-healing, resilient pipelines that detect, fix, and optimize failures in real time—without human intervention.

Title: Prompt-Ready Data: Optimizing SQL Infrastructure for LLM Workloads in Hybrid Environments
Abstract: Learn how to modernize your SQL backend to power AI and LLM-driven apps. Discover how Azure SQL MI and MI Link deliver scalable, observable, prompt-ready infrastructure for hybrid environments with optimized performance and real-time data flow.

Title: Prompt Engineering at Scale: Driving AI-Powered Transformation in Insurance Workflows
Abstract: Explore how prompt engineering powers real-world AI in insurance. From claims triage to underwriting automation, learn how enterprises deploy prompts for speed, accuracy, and compliance at scale.
Slides: Chetan Prakash Ratnawat - Conf42 Prompt Engineering 2025.pdf

Company1: Vice President Software Engineering at JPMorganChase & Co
Title: RAG Agents in Finance: Prompt Engineering for 40% Efficiency Gains
Abstract: Showcasing how strategic prompt engineering transforms financial operations through RAG-enhanced AI agents, delivering 40% efficiency gains and 95% accuracy in processing 50M+ daily transactions at major investment banks.

Title: Power BI & Prompt Engineering: Driving $30M in Supply Chain Savings at Kellogg’s
Abstract: Discover how Kellogg’s unlocked $30M in supply chain savings by combining Power BI analytics with prompt engineering. Learn how AI-driven insights transform data into action, delivering efficiency, agility, and massive ROI in global manufacturing.

Title: From Reactive Prompts to Autonomous Agents: LLMs for Multi-Cloud Infrastructure
Abstract: Discover how LLMs can move beyond generating snippets of code to become autonomous agents for multi-cloud infrastructure, balancing opportunity with the risks of hallucinations, misconfigurations, and cost. Learn practical architectures for safe, scalable orchestration.

JobTitle1: Lead Member of Technical Staff at Salesforce
Title: Prompt-Driven Infrastructure: Sharding AI Services for Scale & Resilience
Abstract: Learn how to scale AI infrastructure using proven sharding strategies. Discover techniques for distributing prompt processing across zones, achieving 99.99% uptime, and building fault-tolerant systems that handle enterprise AI workloads efficiently.

Title: The AI-Driven Future of Network Engineering: Scaling Protocols, Reliability, and Intelligence
Abstract: Discover how AI is transforming network engineering from static infrastructure to intelligent, adaptive systems. Learn the skills, strategies, and tools needed to design scalable, resilient networks built for the future.

Title: Revolutionizing Prompt Engineering: Scalable Frameworks for Safer, Smarter LLMs
Abstract: Discover how cutting-edge evaluation frameworks, ethical AI methods, and adversarial testing are revolutionizing prompt engineering, ensuring safer, smarter, and more reliable LLMs for high-stakes applications

Title: Prompting for Trust: Designing Transparent LLM Systems That Align With Human Judgment
Abstract: LLMs need more than clever prompts—they need trusted ones. Learn how to design prompt architectures that build transparency, context, and user confidence into every interaction. From attribution to audit trails, prompt for trust from the first token.

Title: Scaling Prompt Engineering: How Ultra Ethernet and UALink Accelerate Token-to-Token Performance
Abstract: Prompt engineering at scale needs more than clever text it needs blazing-fast infrastructure. Learn how Ultra Ethernet and UALink boost throughput, reduce inference latency, and accelerate real-time LLM performance across distributed AI systems.

Title: The Secret Language of Models: Prompt Psychology & Behavior
Abstract: Unlock the hidden psychology behind AI responses! In this mind-bending talk, discover how prompts shape model behavior like human thought using framing, priming, and reasoning tricks. Learn to influence LLMs not just with words, but with psychological precision.

Title: Prompt Engineering Healthcare Compliance: Automating 102 Benefits for 2M+ Members
Abstract:
When CMS mandated Medicare Advantage supplemental benefit reporting in 2024, we faced an unprecedented data challenge: consolidating 102 benefit types from more than ten disparate systems for two million members. This presentation reveals how prompt engineering and AI-assisted development accelerated our solution delivery.

Our approach leveraged prompt engineering across the entire development lifecycle. We used large language models (LLMs) to rapidly prototype ETL logic for complex healthcare data transformations, generate SQL for dimensional modeling of our health event data mart, and create comprehensive test scenarios that covered edge cases in benefit utilization patterns. Carefully crafted prompts helped us navigate HIPAA compliance requirements, translating regulatory language into technical specifications and generating audit logging frameworks.

The AWS-based solution (EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS) achieved 100% on-time federal reporting while establishing our organization as a compliance leader. More significantly, our prompt engineering strategy reduced development time by 40%, allowing focus on strategic challenges such as converting compliance data into member communication triggers for unused benefits and building reusable components for future regulatory initiatives.

Key lessons include designing prompts that balance healthcare domain specificity with technical precision, iterating on AI-generated code to meet strict security standards, and using LLMs to bridge communication gaps between clinical, technical, and business stakeholders. We transformed a federal mandate into a single source of truth that eliminated redundant processing and enabled data-driven benefit decisions.

Attendees will learn practical prompt engineering techniques for regulated industries, strategies for AI-assisted architecture in complex integrations, and methods to accelerate compliance-driven solution delivery.

Title: From Manual Testing to Prompt Mastery: How Codeless Automation and AI Prompts Empower Testers in Agile Transformation
Abstract: Discover how codeless automation and prompt engineering transform manual testers into automation leaders. Learn a proven framework that preserves domain expertise, accelerates CI/CD, and unleashes the true potential of QA in agile organizations

Title: Beyond semantic retrievers: leveraging LLMs for question-based document ranking
Abstract: We improved complex document retrieval by using an LLM-driven pairwise ranking approach, prompting the model to judge which document better answers a question. This method outperformed traditional retrievers, boosting recall@k in sspecial retrieval scenarios.

Title: AI-Driven Testing for Conversational AI: LLM-as-Judge, Generative QA, and Scalable Automation
Abstract: Testing conversational AI is hard—human dialogue is unpredictable and diverse. This talk reveals how LLM-as-Judge and generative AI redefine QA with automated evaluation and intelligent test data, enabling scalable, reliable, and cost-efficient testing of voice and chat systems.
